comments: Cases were reported from Village Gayatri Nagar in Visakhapatnam Urban. Patients had loose stools and vomiting. Stool samples showed no pathogenic growth, but three water samples were unsafe. District RRT investigated and provided symptomatic treatment. Community awareness sessions on hygiene and sanitation were conducted.

Outbreak occurred in Village Rosekandi Grant, Silchar subdivision. Patients presented with fever. Blood tests were negative for malaria. District RRT investigated and treated cases symptomatically. Awareness on vector control, hygiene, and sanitation was provided.

Cases reported from Village Lamtaput after a community meal. Symptoms included vomiting and diarrhea. District RRT investigated, provided symptomatic treatment, and gave health education on food hygiene.
Cases reported from Rayagada town after a religious function. Patients presented with diarrhea and abdominal pain. RRT investigated, cases treated, and awareness on food safety provided.
Cases reported from Rourkela subdivision following a community meal. Patients had vomiting and diarrhea. District RRT investigated, treated cases, and educated community on food hygiene.
